1.title: Bobby Bonilla

episode of.title: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards (TV Mini-Series 2018)

1.plot: Discouraged about losing business to a competitor, Roscoe comes up with an idea to get the upper hand, but Frank isn't convinced. Things take a turn for the worst when the boys find out they have to make an unplanned visit to Reno.

2.title: Will the real Bobby B... please stand up.

episode of.title: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards (TV Mini-Series 2018)

2.plot: Things escalate quickly, causing Roscoe to recall the memory of opening day back in April of 1993 and how it became a driving force for resenting his father. Struggling to convince him to come to Reno, Frank, makes him an offer he can't refuse.

3.title: Troy, from Swanson Street

episode of.title: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards (TV Mini-Series 2018)

3.plot: After traveling to Reno to settle their father's estate, or lack thereof. Frank discovers the one thing he left behind, a 1980 Rickey Henderson rookie card. Intended for Roscoe, alongside a crippling note with one last zinger from dad. Frank decides to hold onto the card and keep Roscoe out of it all together.

4.title: Man of Steal

episode of.title: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards (TV Mini-Series 2018)

4.plot: After they boys return home from Reno, Frank makes Roscoe believe that dad left him the Rickey Henderson rookie card. The truth is, the man of steal was left behind for Roscoe, but like a good brother, Frank doesn't let him in on that.

5.title: A Real Tear Jerker

episode of.title: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards (TV Mini-Series 2018)

5.plot: After giving Roscoe the card, Frank must decide to let him live with the idea that dad loved him, or give him the note with dad's true last words.

imdb.title: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards
akas: Bounce Houses and Baseball Cards (United States)
plot: Two fiercely competitive brothers, with clashing personalities, learn to overcome their family's most recent dysfunctional episode; by throwing all the cards on the table and pursuing the awkward dream of bounce house ownership.
